plot: An unconventional love story that asks the question, 'what happens when we die?' The answer is that we must repay our debt to the world by helping seven souls cross over. Then we can rest.
title: Seven Souls
plot_es: An unconventional love story that asks the question, 'what happens when we die?' The answer is that we must repay our debt to the world by helping seven souls cross over. Then we can rest.
plot_en: An unconventional love story that asks the question, 'what happens when we die?' The answer is that we must repay our debt to the world by helping seven souls cross over. Then we can rest.
